name: download_cities
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool priceline_com_provider.
Tool description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Downloads a list of cities from the Priceline API.

limit.description: Limits the number of results returned. Defaults to 500.

resume_key.description: Key to resume the results from a given ID. Defaults to None.
